bordered.description: Whether to display outer borders and column borders
bordered.description_zh: 是否展示外边框和列边框

:columns.description: The following table describes the configuration of the table columns
:columns.description_zh: 表格列的配置描述，具体项见下表

:components.description_zh: 覆盖默认的 table 元素

:getPopupContainer.description: Set the rendering nodes for various types of floating layers in the table, such as the filter menu
:getPopupContainer.description_zh: 设置表格内各类浮层的渲染节点，如筛选菜单

locale.description: The default copywriting settings currently include sorting, filtering, and empty data copy
locale.description_zh: 默认文案设置，目前包括排序、过滤、空数据文案

pagination.description: Paginer, which is set to false does not show and pagination
pagination.description_zh: 分页器，设为 false 时不展示和进行分页

:rowClassName.description: The class name of the table row

rowKey.description: The value of the table row key can be a string or a function
rowKey.description_zh: 表格行 key 的取值，可以是字符串或一个函数

rowSelection.description: Whether table rows can be selected, [Config]
rowSelection.description_zh: 表格行是否可选择，[配置项]

:scroll.description: Whether the table is scrollable or not, you can also specify the width and height of the scrolling area
:scroll.description_zh: 表格是否可滚动，也可以指定滚动区域的宽、高

showSorterTooltip.description: Whether the header displays a tooltip hint for the next sort. When the parameter type is Object, it will be set as a property of the Tooltip
showSorterTooltip.description_zh: 表头是否显示下一次排序的 tooltip 提示。当参数类型为对象时，将被设置为 Tooltip 的属性

:sortDirections.description: The supported sorting method can be 'ascend' descend
:sortDirections.description_zh: 支持的排序方式，取值为 `ascend` descend

sticky.description: Set the sticky head and scrollbar
sticky.type: boolean | `{offsetHeader?: number, offsetScroll?: number, getContainer?: () => HTMLElement}`
sticky.description_zh: 设置粘性头部和滚动条

tableLayout.description: The [table-layout](https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/CSS/table-layout) property of the table element, set to 'fixed' means that the content does not affect the layout of the column
tableLayout.default: 无<hr | >固定表头 | 列或使用了 `column.ellipsis` 时，默认值为 fixed
tableLayout.description_zh: 表格元素的 [table-layout](https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/CSS/table-layout) 属性，设为 `fixed` 表示内容不会影响列的布局

methods.name: scrollTo
methods.type: (config: { index?: number, key?: React.Key, top?: number }) => void
methods.description: Scroll to the target location (rowKey for Record when the key is set)
methods.description_zh: 滚动到目标位置（设置 key 时为 Record 对应的 rowKey）

events.name: onChange
events.description: Triggered when there are changes in pagination, sorting, and filtering
events.params: function(pagination, filters, sorter, extra: { currentDataSource: [], action: `paginate` | sort | `filter` })
events.description_zh: 分页、排序、筛选变化时触发
